title: Printer paper jam / انحشار الورق
steps: Turn printer off and open all access doors.
Remove jammed paper gently in feed direction.
Check trays and fuser area, remove scraps.
Reload paper, close doors, power on.
Print a test page and clear any error codes.

title: VPN cannot connect
steps: Verify internet works without VPN.
Restart VPN client and try another gateway if available.
Clear cached credentials and re‑enter username/password.
Disable other adapters temporarily (Wi‑Fi/Ethernet).
If fails, capture exact error code and contact IT.

title: Password reset / حساب مقفول
steps: Wait 15 minutes after multiple failed attempts.
Use the company self‑service reset portal if available.
Create a strong new password (12+ chars, mixed case, number, symbol).
Lock and unlock workstation to sync credentials.
Sign out / sign in to Outlook and VPN.

title: MS Teams audio/video not working
steps: Unplug/replug headset; select correct device in Teams settings.
Allow microphone/camera permissions in Windows privacy settings.
Close other apps using camera (Zoom/OBS).
Run Windows Troubleshooter for Recording/Playback.
Restart Teams (right‑click tray icon → Quit) and rejoin.

title: PC won’t boot
steps: Disconnect USB devices and try again.
Hold power 10s to fully shut down, then power on.
Enter BIOS to ensure disk is detected and boot order is correct.
Run Windows Startup Repair from recovery if available.
Escalate to IT for hardware diagnostics.

title: DNS problems / مشاكل DNS
steps: Open Command Prompt as admin.
Run: ipconfig /flushdns
Run: ipconfig /release then ipconfig /renew
Test with another site and with 8.8.8.8
If only one site fails, try clearing browser cache.
